channel.title: Pk points system
channel.description: Hi i have a shop called RZP Exchange it is a point shop like dfs = 15000 pts and i added new items to the shop example chaotic raper = 0 points i was wondering what i can go into to change the add points to my new items i put in the shop ?

item.title: Pk points system
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

go server/models/shops/shopassistant.java - and search for an item that is in the rzp shop thats where the rzp shop prices are defined

Read full topic
